Description of incident: Sensitive paperwork was left in a publicly accessible dumpster after Restart Behavioral Health Care moved to a new location. Contact information and financial information such as email addresses, phone numbers, names, and check receipts could be found.  Social Security card information and Medicaid numbers were also in the dumpster.  A local news team contacted the owner of Restart.  He refused to comment on the situation, but demanded the return of the documents.
